name: Jelly Clash 3D
description:
Are you passionate about speed and ready for a race? Join a one-of-a-kind race at Blob Runner today. Surely you will wonder what this game is about and what it will do amazing, right?
You will play the role of a jelly man, run and overcome obstacles, collect more jellies to become giant. Try to escape from deadly obstacles or lose a few limbs. But if unfortunately you get caught in the obstacle and only a very small piece of jelly is left, don't worry, just move and collect more jellies, you can still complete the challenge.
Remember, when you have collected enough jellies and you have enough strength, try to reach the highest reward level.Get bigger, stronger and super jelly to collect special rewards! We may also have some surprises you might not expect. Don't forget to decorate your jelly with makeup items on the go.
HOW TO PLAY:
- Start with small jelly people
- Collect jellies and makeup along the way
- Make the blob runner bigger with more jellies.
- Avoid all obstacles
- Jump up to get the highest reward
- Change variety of jellies for players
FEATURE:
- Unlimited levels
- Super fun gameplay
- Sharp graphics
- Smooth controls
- Free download
You can customize your blob with a variety of hats and different skins. Show your style by unlocking the one you desire!
